Hello everyone,

I am looking for some help with the following. I basically have two buttons, one tracking the cooldown of Ice Block of a hostile unit and the other button tracking Cold Snap. I want the timer of button 1 to reset upon activation of button 2. I've tried using the condition "Icon Shown" and using the "failed opacity", but that doesn't seem to work because the second Ice Block won't show up then. Anyone did something similar to this?

Thanks in advance


> Posted by CurseForge user daniel1992 | Imported from CurseForge issue #593 | Raw

comments.body:
Unit cooldown icons should track cooldown resets on their own. I did Identify a bug that was preventing this from happening in many situations, though.

This issue should be fixed in r582. Let me know if it isn't. (So, basically, you can delete the cold snap icon now if its only purpose was to try and reset the ice block icon.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
